channel.title: Noob questions
channel.description: 1. What file would I find the npc's in? and where to change their hp, what they drop, and how do i make it so its hard or rare for it drop drop this or that what to i type in crlt-f 2. What file do you go into to change what a shop has, howmuch it is, howmany are in stock

item.title: Noob questions
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“ipwndu, post:1, topic:268593”]1. What file would I find the npc’s in? and where to change their hp, what they drop, and how do i make it so its hard or rare for it drop drop this or that what to i type in crlt-f
2. What file do you go into to change what a shop has, howmuch it is, howmany are in stock[/quote]

  1. For the NPC spawning, autospawn.cfg. Their HP can be found in the NPC.cfg file. The drops may either be found in the item2 class or the NPCDrops.cfg file. The rarity of the drop is also found in either the item2 class or the NPCDrops.cfg file.

  2. shops.cfg

Read full topic
